title: Watch-Point
desc: A single page full-stack site related to     wrist-watch built with react
moreDesc: Full Stack Single Page Website | Wrist-Watch Selling Site Uses first need register/ create their   account                                                                  A normal user can access and manage their                        existing orders and add review after logging in.                        The review will be shown in the home page                                                                     An admin has some extra priviliges      like                                                                    can add products which will be added in the explore section and also    he/she can a make another user admin as well                            An admin can manage orders of all users including him/herself and can change all users' order status                                        and delete their orders as well                                 Technologies : ReactJs,React-Bootstrap,Firebase,Heroku

title: Travel-Planner

User can see and access their orders in different section where they can delete their existing order and update the order status by clicking relative buttons
